tickets.title: Update Hero Section to display Vamos Vamos messaging
tickets.description:
Update the home page Hero Section component to replace current 'Your Tech Partner as a Service' messaging with 'Vamos Vamos' as the primary headline. Keep existing visual design patterns, animations, and CTA structure.

**Changes Required:**
- Replace main headline with 'Vamos Vamos' (maintaining AuroraText effect with green colors)
- Update supporting description copy to explain what Vamos Vamos offers (2-3 sentences)
- Keep all existing visual elements: badge, startup program link, Contact Us CTA button, motion animations
- Maintain responsive sizing and layout
- Preserve AuroraText gradient colors (#10B981, #22c55e, #34D399, #059669)

**File to modify:**
- src/app/(logged-out)/home/components/hero-section.tsx

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Hero headline displays 'Vamos Vamos' with AuroraText gradient effect
- New supporting description explains the value proposition
- All motion animations work smoothly
- Responsive design maintained across mobile, tablet, and desktop
- Startup program badge and Contact Us CTA remain functional
- Component compiles without TypeScript errors
- Lint and build checks pass
